  • 已过时的接口 
    接口和说明
    org.opentcs.customizations.ConfigurationBindingProvider
    Use ConfigurationBindingProvider instead.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventFilter
    EventSource.addEventListener(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventListener, org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventFilter) will be removed.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventListener
    For event handling, use classes in org.opentcs.util.event instead.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventSource
    For event handling, use classes in org.opentcs.util.event instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.KernelProxy
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.
    org.opentcs.components.kernel.ParkingPositionSupplier
    Implementation-specific interface does not belong into generic API. Moved to implementation.
    org.opentcs.components.kernel.RechargePositionSupplier
    Implementation-specific interface does not belong into generic API. Moved to implementation.
    org.opentcs.components.kernel.RecoveryEvaluator
    The definition of recovered is unclear. Unless it is clearly specified, evaluation of a state of recovery should not be part of the API.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel
    Use RemoteKernelServicePortal instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernelConnection
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.
    org.opentcs.access.SharedKernelClient
    Use SharedKernelServicePortal instead.
    org.opentcs.access.SharedKernelProvider
    Use SharedKernelServicePortalProvider instead.

    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.AcceptingTCSEventFilter
    EventFilter is deprecated.

    Explicit support for anonymous cipher suites will be removed. Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider.

    Explicit support for anonymous cipher suites will be removed. Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.factories.AnonSslSocketFactoryProvider
    Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider instead.

    For event handling, use classes in org.opentcs.util.event instead.

    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.

    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.

    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.

    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.

    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.PublishEventCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.access.queries.Queries
    Not really an API class.

    Instead of queries, explicit service calls should be used.

    Instead of queries, explicit service calls should be used.
    org.opentcs.access.queries.QueryRecoveryStatus
    Instead of queries, explicit service calls should be used.
    org.opentcs.access.queries.QueryRoutingInfo
    Does not serve any real purpose and will be removed.
    org.opentcs.access.queries.QuerySchedulerAllocations
    Instead of queries, explicit service calls should be used.
    org.opentcs.access.queries.QueryTopologyInfo
    Instead of queries, explicit service calls should be used.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.RefusingTCSEventFilter
    EventFilter is deprecated.
    org.opentcs.data.order.Rejection
    Rejections are replaced by object history entries.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.ResetPositionCommand
    Instead, set a proper Vehicle.IntegrationLevel to just ignore a vehicle's position.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.SetEnergyLevelCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.SetLoadHandlingDevicesCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.SetOrienatationAngleCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.SetPercisePositionCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.SetPositionCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.SetStateCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.commands.SetVehiclePropertyCommand
    Is specific to the loopback communication adapter and now implemented and used there.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.factories.SslSocketFactoryProvider
    Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider instead.
    org.opentcs.data.model.StaticRoute
    Static routes are an undesirable exception to routes computed by a Router implementation and will not be supported in the future.
    org.opentcs.access.to.model.StaticRouteCreationTO
    Static routes are an undesirable exception to routes computed by a Router implementation and will not be supported in the future.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.SynchronousEventHub
    For event handling, use classes in org.opentcs.util.event instead.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.TCSEvent
    For event handling, use classes in org.opentcs.util.event instead.
    org.opentcs.access.TCSKernelStateEvent
    Use KernelStateTransitionEvent instead, which does not extend TCSEvent.
    org.opentcs.access.TCSModelTransitionEvent
    Use ModelTransitionEvent instead, which does not extend TCSEvent.
    org.opentcs.access.TCSNotificationEvent
    Use NotificationPublicationEvent instead, which does not extend TCSEvent.
    org.opentcs.data.TCSObjectEventFilter
    EventFilter is deprecated.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.TCSProxyStateEvent
    Use ClientConnectionMode instead.
    org.opentcs.access.TravelCosts
    Providing travel costs to external clients will not be part of the standard kernel API any more.
    org.opentcs.data.user.UserAccount
    User management via kernel interaction will not be supported in the future.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.VehicleCommAdapterPanel
    Use VehicleCommAdapterPanel instead.
    org.opentcs.data.model.visualization.ViewBookmark

  • 已过时的字段 
    字段和说明
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.services.RemoteKernelServicePortal.GUEST_PASSWORD
    In the future, user credentials will be part of the applications, not the API.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.services.RemoteKernelServicePortal.GUEST_USER
    In the future, user credentials will be part of the applications, not the API.
    org.opentcs.data.ObjectPropConstants.LOCATION_THEME_CLASS
    The theme to be used is now set directly via configuration.
    org.opentcs.data.model.visualization.ElementPropKeys.PATH_ARROW_POSITION
    Will be removed.
    org.opentcs.data.ObjectPropConstants.PATH_TRAVEL_ORIENTATION
    Will be removed.
    org.opentcs.data.ObjectPropConstants.VEHICLE_INITIAL_POSITION
    Use vehicle driver-specific properties to specify the vehicle's initial position.
    org.opentcs.data.ObjectPropConstants.VEHICLE_THEME_CLASS
    The theme to be used is now set directly via configuration.
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel.activateTransportOrder(ClientID, TCSObjectReference<TransportOrder>)
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.activateTransportOrder(TCSObjectReference<TransportOrder>)
    Use TransportOrderService.createTransportOrder( org.opentcs.access.to.order.TransportOrderCreationTO) instead.
    org.opentcs.data.model.LocationType.addAllowedOperation(String)
    Set via constructor instead.
    org.opentcs.data.model.Location.Link.addAllowedOperation(String)
    Will become immutable.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel.addBlockMember(ClientID, TCSObjectReference<Block>, TCSResourceReference<?>)
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.addBlockMember(TCSObjectReference<Block>, TCSResourceReference<?>)
    Use Kernel.createPlantModel(org.opentcs.access.to.model.PlantModelCreationTO) instead.
    org.opentcs.data.order.TransportOrder.addDependency(TCSObjectReference<TransportOrder>)
    Will become immutable.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventSource.addEventListener(EventListener<E>, EventFilter<E>)
    Use EventSource.addEventListener(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventListener) instead, and filter out unwanted events in EventListener.processEvent(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.Event). (Note that you should do that, anyway, which is why a separate event filter is superfluous.)
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventHub.addEventListener(EventListener<E>, EventFilter<E>)
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.addEventListener(EventListener<TCSEvent>)
    Subscribe/Unsubscribe to the application's event bus instead.
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.addEventListener(EventListener<TCSEvent>, EventFilter<TCSEvent>)
    Subscribe/Unsubscribe to the application's event bus instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel.addGroupMember(ClientID, TCSObjectReference<Group>, TCSObjectReference<?>)
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.addGroupMember(TCSObjectReference<Group>, TCSObjectReference<?>)

    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.createTransportOrder(TransportOrderCreationTO)
    Use TransportOrderService.createTransportOrder( org.opentcs.access.to.order.TransportOrderCreationTO) instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel.createTransportOrdersFromScript(ClientID, String)
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.createTransportOrdersFromScript(String)
    Parsing and evaluating scripts/batch files is out of scope for the kernel. Such files should be handled outside the kernel, e.g. in a kernel extension, and lead to calls of Kernel.createTransportOrder(org.opentcs.access.to.order.TransportOrderCreationTO), instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel.createUser(ClientID, String, String, Set<UserPermission>)
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.createUser(String, String, Set<UserPermission>)
    User management should be strictly configuration-based and will not be supported by kernel interaction in the future.
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.createVehicle()
    Use Kernel.createPlantModel(org.opentcs.access.to.model.PlantModelCreationTO) instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel.createVehicle(ClientID)
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.createVisualLayout()
    Use Kernel.createPlantModel(org.opentcs.access.to.model.PlantModelCreationTO) instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.RemoteKernel.createVisualLayout(ClientID)

    Will become immutable.

    Use Kernel.createPlantModel(org.opentcs.access.to.model.PlantModelCreationTO) instead.

    Use Dispatcher.dispatch() instead.

    Use DispatcherService.dispatch() instead.

    Use InternalPlantModelService.expandResources(java.util.Set) instead.

    Implement and use VehicleCommAdapterFactory.getDescription() instead.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.BasicVehicleCommAdapter.getAdapterPanels()
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.VehicleCommAdapter.getAdapterPanels()

    org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle.getAdapterState()
    VehicleCommAdapter.State is deprecated.
    org.opentcs.data.model.visualization.VisualLayout.getColors()
    Will be removed.
    org.opentcs.access.LocalKernel.getConfigurationItems()
    Configuration management is out of scope for the kernel.
    org.opentcs.components.kernel.Router.getCosts(Vehicle, TCSObjectReference<Location>, TCSObjectReference<Location>)
    Use Router.getCosts(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle, org.opentcs.data.model.Point, org.opentcs.data.model.Point) instead.
    org.opentcs.data.TCSObjectReference.getDummyReference(Class<T>, String)
    Dummy references are deprecated. In case of drive order destinations, use DriveOrder.Destination#Destination(org.opentcs.data.TCSObjectReference) instead.
    org.opentcs.access.rmi.KernelProxyBuilder.getEventFilter()
    EventFilter is deprecated.
    org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventHub.getEventListeners()
    Use EventHub.eventListeners() instead.
    org.opentcs.data.TCSObjectReference.getId()
    Will be removed.
    org.opentcs.data.TCSObject.getId()
    Will be removed.
    org.opentcs.components.plantoverview.VehicleTheme.getImageFor(Vehicle)
    Use VehicleTheme.statefulImage(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle) or VehicleTheme.statelessImage(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle) instead.
    org.opentcs.components.kernel.Router.getInfo()

    枚举常量和说明
    org.opentcs.data.order.DriveOrder.State.ACTIVE
    Unused. Will be removed.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.VehicleProcessModel.Attribute.COMM_ADAPTER_STATE
    VehicleCommAdapter.State is deprecated.
    org.opentcs.data.user.UserPermission.MANAGE_USERS
    User management via kernel interaction will not be supported in the future.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.VehicleProcessModel.Attribute.MAX_REVERSE_VELOCITY
    The maximum velocity is not a dynamic vehicle attribute.
    org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle.VehicleProcessModel.Attribute.MAX_VELOCITY
    The maximum velocity is not a dynamic vehicle attribute.
    org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle.ProcState.UNAVAILABLE
    Vehicle.ProcState.IDLE will be the default processing state in the future.
